content: **knitted top in drops paris piece is knitted with textured pattern size xs xxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern w-798 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size ** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **materials** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 250-250-250-300-350-400 g colour 63 desert rose **knitting gauge ** 16 stitches in width and 24 row vertically in texture pattern = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 5 5 mm length 80 cm for texture pattern drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 cm for rib needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size
